page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content:
The houses in our block are a mixture of styles and types.Some are made of brick and cob but most are made of stone.There are about 90_100 houses in the village: there are bungalows, cottages, semi_detached and detached houses. About half of these are modern, built in the last ten years. The rest are older, some being very old indeed (The Bell Inn is the oldest at about 700 years old and is the only thatched builing in the village).
The population of the village is about 150. The inhabitants either work in farming related industries, service industries or in offices and businesses in the surrounding towns of Bideford,Torrington and Barnstaple.
